The goal of **`refunder`** is to interface **`refund`** and **`tidyfun`**.

## Installation

``` r
devtools::install_github("tidyfun/refunder")
```

## `tidy_fpca()`

The `tidy_fpca()` function peforms `fpca` using functions from the `refund` package. The input is a dataframe with `tfd` columns. 

Below are examples using the dti and cd4 datasets.


```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(tidyfun)
library(refunder)

data(dti_df)
dti_fpca = tidy_fpca(cca, dti_df)

cd4_df = tibble(cd4_count = tfd(refund::cd4))
results = tidy_fpca(cd4_count, cd4_df, npc = 4)

```
